title: 82/555/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1982 approving the extended plan for the eradication of enzootic bovine leucosis submitted by the Kingdom of Denmark (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 July 1982
approving the extended plan for the eradication of enzootic bovine leucosis submitted by the Kingdom of Denmark
(Only the Danish text is authentic)
(82/555/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The extended plan for the eradication of leucosis as applied by the Kingdom of Denmark from 15 May 1981 is hereby approved.
Financial participation by the Community shall be in respect of eligible expenditure on account of slaughterings taking place on or after 15 May 1981.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
